description.arabic: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.brazilian: Conecte pelo menos uma planta de cada espécie à rede viva.
description.bulgarian: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.czech: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.danish: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.dutch: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.english: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.finnish: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.french: Connectez au moins une plante de chaque espèce au réseau vivant.
description.german: Verbinde mindestens eine Pflanze jeder Art mit dem lebenden Netzwerk.
description.greek: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.hungarian: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.italian: Collega almeno una pianta per tipo alla rete della vita.
description.japanese: 自然のネットワークに植物各種をそれぞれ1つ以上繋げる。
description.koreana: 각 식물 종 중 하나 이상을 생체망에 연결하세요.
description.norwegian: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.polish: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.romanian: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.russian: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.schinese: 确保每种植物至少有一株连接至生命网络。
description.spanish: Conecta al menos un ejemplar de cada especie de planta a la red viviente.
description.swedish: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.tchinese: 將每種植物（至少各一株）連結至活體網路。
description.thai: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.turkish: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.ukrainian: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.
description.vietnamese: Connect at least one of each plant species to the living network.

description.arabic: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.brazilian: Junte uma unidade de cada fruta em uma saborosa pilha (dez frutas ao todo).
description.bulgarian: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.czech: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.danish: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.dutch: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.english: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.finnish: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.french: Rassemblez un spécimen de chaque fruit, dix au total, dans un tas juteux.
description.german: Sammle eine Probe von jeder Frucht, insgesamt zehn, auf einem saftigen Haufen.
description.greek: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.hungarian: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.italian: Raccogli un campione di ogni frutto, dieci in totale, in un unico mucchietto succulento.
description.japanese: 合計10種類の果実サンプルをそれぞれ集めて1つにまとめる。

description.norwegian: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.polish: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.romanian: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.russian: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.schinese: 每种水果各收集一份（总计十种）并将其汇聚成美味多汁的一份大礼。
description.spanish: Recolecta un espécimen de cada fruto, diez en total, en un jugoso montón.
description.swedish: Gather one specimen of every fruit, ten in total, in one juicy pile.
description.tchinese: 將全部共十種水果各一顆堆成一堆。

description.arabic: Gather one specimen of every critter's non-battered guts, twelve in total, in one juicy pile.
description.brazilian: Junte uma unidade de vísceras não surradas de cada criatura em uma saborosa pilha (doze criaturas ao todo).
description.bulgarian: Gather one specimen of every critter's non-battered guts, twelve in total, in one juicy pile.
description.czech: Gather one specimen of every critter's non-battered guts, twelve in total, in one juicy pile.

description.koreana: 한 더미에 구타당하지 않은 모든 생물의 표본 한 개씩, 총 열두 개를 모으세요.
